name: TEX
description:
Short typing-adventure featuring Tex, a young countryman who's mothers fall sick and in his desperation decides to start a travel around the country in search of three magical plants to aid her.

But the strange disease has not only affected his mother, but is also spreading madness in all the ecosystems. Embark on the adventure and use your linguistic and mechanography skills to help Tex in his odyssey. 

Collect memories to unlock level backgrounds, buy items on the store and equip the best armours, weapons and support objects.
